section.45: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin Mas'ud:"Allah has not created in the heavens nor in the earth what is more magnificent than Ayat Al-Kursi." Sufyan said: "Because Ayat Al-Kursi is the Speech of Allah, and Allah's Speech is greater than Allah's creation of the heavens and the earth
